import json
from pathlib import Path

# 20개만 추출
with open(''test_queries_100.json'', ''r'', encoding=''utf-8'') as f:
    data = json.load(f)
    
sample = {
    ''total'': 20,
    ''categories'': {''legal'': 5, ''market'': 5, ''loan'': 5, ''complex'': 5},
    ''queries'': data[''queries''][:20]
}

with open(''test_queries_20.json'', ''w'', encoding=''utf-8'') as f:
    json.dump(sample, f, ensure_ascii=False, indent=2)

print(''Created test_queries_20.json with 20 queries'')
